option6.name: RSTDISBL
option6.desc: Reset Disabled (Enable PC2 as i/o pin)

option10.name: EESAVE
option10.desc: Preserve EEPROM through the Chip Erase cycle

option13.name: BODPD
option13.desc: BOD mode of operation when the device is in sleep mode

option14.name: BODACT
option14.desc: BOD mode of operation when the device is active or idle

case1.message: These fuse settings will disable the ISP interface!

case2.message: Disabling external reset will make the ISP interface inaccessible!

case3.message: Enabling DEBUGWIRE will make the ISP interface inaccessible!

case4.message: Using this clock option will require a slow ISP speed!
